content.raw: It´s true that it is in the bitbucket repo. It is not available via the http://gazebosim.org/models/ url that drcsim checks however. Given that this "carefree" downloading of models worked before I´d like to see it doing so again. Of course you can pull the gazebo_models repo, but that´s another step that has to be maintained and/or explained to the multitude of people on a team.
content.html: It´s true that it is in the bitbucket repo. It is not available via the http://gazebosim.org/models/ url that drcsim checks however. Given that this "carefree" downloading of models worked before I´d like to see it doing so again. Of course you can pull the gazebo_models repo, but that´s another step that has to be maintained and/or explained to the multitude of people on a team.
